wikipedia_page.main: Isaac Jenks (17 March 1816 – 29 January 1888) was an industrialist and ironmaster, who served as Mayor of Wolverhampton in 1872–1873. he became a prominent Wesleyan Methodist benefactor.

response: *Isaac Jenks (1816–1888), ironmaster and Mayor of Wolverhampton, died at Rhyl.
|align=center| 24 || Isaac Jenks  || 1872/73 ||align=center| 1 || Ironmaster. Donated the gold chain and badge of office still in use today
